column3: Baseline, Enrollment, Randomization: Visit 1 (Day 0: Initial Clinic Visit)
column5: Treatment Visit 3 (After Surgery & Before Same Day Discharge)
column8: Follow-Up: Final Visit (6- Month Postoperative Visit)

column1: Delirium & Cognitive Assessment: (1) Confusion Assessment Method short form, (2) Montreal Cognitive Assessment (5 minute version), (3) Trail Making Tests Parts A & B,
Frailty Assessment: Fatigue, Resistance, Ambulation, Illness and Loss of Weight Scale
Quality of Life: Carolinas Comfort Scale
